bullish_factors: QQQ consolidating near $490 level for past week
NVDA earnings in 10 days - expect pinning action until then
Low realized vol vs implied - butterfly theta decay favorable
decisions.rationale: Long call butterfly centered at $490 anticipating QQQ pins near current level into Feb expiration. Max profit $10 per spread (width) - $2.15 debit = $7.85 x 10 = $7,850 if QQQ closes at exactly $490. Max loss limited to $2.15 debit x 10 = $2,150. Breakevens at $482.15 and $497.85. Risk/reward ~3.6:1.

plan_rationale: Butterfly spread for pinning thesis: QQQ has been range-bound $485-$495 for 8 sessions. Expecting continued consolidation ahead of major tech earnings. Low-cost, defined-risk strategy to profit from time decay and lack of movement. Position sized at ~2% portfolio risk.
